# Frontend Stack Blueprint

> Canonical frontend stack reference for AI coding agents. Platform-
> agnostic: same core stack for any project. Deployment targets are
> optional layers.

## Consumer Contract (read first)

- Audience: external coding agents consuming this repository as reference.
- This file is a navigation index for fast retrieval.
- For full operational rules, use `llms-full.txt`.
- If any document conflicts, treat `stack.yaml` as the source of truth.
- Local maintenance workflow lives in `.claude/skills/blueprint-maintenance/SKILL.md`.

## Universal Governance (technology-agnostic)

- Keep one canonical source of truth for rules and versions.
- Keep machine-readable artifacts and narrative docs synchronized.
- Classify changes by impact/risk before implementation.
- Never silently remove consolidated decisions; deprecate with migration path.
- Use explicit dates and absolute versions for temporal claims.
- If context is ambiguous, ask the developer instead of guessing.

## Stack (applies to every project)

- [Full Spec](stack/STACK.md): Complete manifest
- [Architecture](stack/architecture.md): Modular, DRY, KISS, YAGNI
- [Core](stack/core.md): TypeScript, React, TanStack Router / React Router
- [Build & Test](stack/build-and-test.md): Vite (Node.js >=20.19 or >=22.12), Vitest, Husky
- [UI](stack/ui.md): Radix UI, shadcn/ui, Floating UI, Embla, cmdk
- [Forms](stack/forms.md): React Hook Form + Zod
- [Styling](stack/styling.md): Tailwind CSS, Motion
- [State](stack/state-and-data.md): Zustand + TanStack Query (TanStack Store replaces Zustand at v1 GA)
- [Dates](stack/dates.md): date-fns
- [Content](stack/content.md): Lexical, ProseMirror, Shiki
- [i18n](stack/i18n.md): Format.js, react-intl
- [Observability](stack/observability.md): Sentry, OTel, Statsig
- [Icons](stack/icons.md): Lucide (default), Phosphor, Tabler
- [Machine-readable](stack.yaml): Versions and install commands

## Deployment Targets (optional)

- [Overview](targets/TARGETS.md): When to use each
- [Electron](targets/electron.md)
- [Tauri](targets/tauri.md)
- [PWA](targets/pwa.md)
